title: Say You Love Satan
description: Ricky Kasso, Jimmy Trolano, and Gary Lauwers were three kids from good homes. But by the time they hit high school they were bad boys....Cutting class, smoking marijuana, taking LSD and angel dust. Everyone knew they were headed for trouble, but no guessed that they were also "getting into Satan"...Until one dark night in the chic town of Northport, Satan said to kill...
author: David St. Clair
